name: blue bird boo
description:
Waggle your phone and fingers to flap your way to safety in Blue Bird Boo!

Dodge the obstacles, skirt the jetstream, and struggle against the irresistable pull of gravity as you journey across the skies in search of food for your chicks. Do you have what it takes to navigate the hilltops and gale winds?

See if you can master this devilishly difficult take on Flappy Bird!
